name: cnn-visualizer
description: ## Introduction This repository contains the codes and results for visualizing the units (or named as neuron or convolutional filters) inside deep CNN. Some of the codes have been used for the [ICLR'15 paper](https://arxiv.org/pdf/1412.6856.pdf) Object Detectors Emerge in Deep Scene CNNs. You can use this toolkit with the naive [caffe](https://github.com/BVLC/caffe), with matcaffe and pycaffe compiled, or [pyTorch](http://pytorch.org/). This toolkit includes the following functions:
